 Apocalypse and his troops watched as the mines came
out after the destructocons. He smiled. "Good our
blockers are more useful then we thought. To the
mines...there will be no one there. Without the
frequency to them that Guiledart has they cant adapt.
This is going to be easy." He and his troops flew back
to the ship and watched as Drillbit started the hole.
He looked at Cyngar. "They have locateing mines. The
signals will take care of that so I suggest to totaly
elemenate them you bring some for the destructocons
when we arrive." He was ready. It was almost time.
